name: Azkaban
description: An island prison in the middle of the North Sea for dangerous wizards and witches
whereInTheWorld: An island in the middle of the North Sea
residentsOrOwners: Prominent figures who have spent time in Azkaban include: Sirius Black, Bellatrix and Rodolphus Lestrange, Lucius Malfoy, Rubeus Hagrid and Dolores Umbridge
